content: and moving animals forward based on the color rolled example if you roll green move the green frog to the next square in its row winning the game the game ends when the first animal reaches the opposite sides corresponding colored square designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo watch gameplay here on youtube enjoy your new stitchy sprint board game if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
